item.title: [GRA/RBX/SBG/BHS][Collaborative solutions] - Exchange Hosted and Private search feature
item.description:
Mar 15, 09:11 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Mar 14, 14:14 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 14/03/2024 14:00 UTC
Service impact : Microsoft Outlook product is facing an issue that prevent clients to perform a search. Application like OWA, ActiveSync are working without impact. We are investingating with Microsoft to identify the root cause of this issue.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Workaround : Temporary you can disable the ServerAssistedSearch by creating registry key base on the schema bellow.

• Key: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Office\16.0\Outlook\Search
• Value name: DisableServerAssistedSearch
• Value type: REG_DWORD
• Value: 1

Please remember that altering registry key require creation of backup and done incorrectly can damage your computer.

Thank you for your trust. Security and protection of your data remain our highest priority, and it is in this frame of mind that we have been operating for years.

item.title: [GRA][WebPaaS] - Infrastructure Maintenance
item.description:
Mar 14, 04:17 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Mar 14, 03:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 12, 14:51 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our "Web PaaS" offer.

Start time : 14/03/2024 03:30 UTC
End time : 14/03/2024 04:30 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade, however Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the re-indexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release the latest features, bug fixes and performance updates.

Thank you for your understanding.
